title: Any news about FX-processors fix?
body:
Is there any news regarding this? https://gyazo.com/81c3c29fc5c082a3c5852889ae9361fa

Sucks to play with only 30-ish fps while i used to get 120+ 
Has been going on for almost half a year now, expected a fix a while ago :/

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure if this will help much, but let's try adjusting some of your in-game settings to see if that helps at all. We've recently put together a guide for [**frame skipping on high end machines**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626) and how to make sure the game is using your [**dedicated graphics card**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002840248). Give those two a try and let me know how they work.

Hey, 
i tried quite a few things with help from people who answered my support ticket and after a couple of days they told me it was a bug not on my end with the FX-processors, so unfortunately i've tried everything you linked. thanks for the reply though! 
I was wondering if there was any progress yet?
Hmmmm I haven't seen anything new about FX Processors lately, but I'll ask around and be sure to respond if I'm able to figure anything out for you!!
